law.text: The commission shall exercise the powers prescribed by KRS 162.520, 162.540, 162.550, 162.580, 162.590, 162.600, and 162.620 for the purpose of assisting boards of education of any county or independent school district in financing public school building projects and undertakings.
law.history: Repealed and reenacted 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. V, sec. 285, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 255, sec. 60. -- Created 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 7, sec. 7.
